thread.section_title: MyUS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyUS.com | myus2.myus.com
thread.title: Sameh Ebrahim

author: Sameh Ebrahim
title: Sameh Ebrahim
text: I ship with this company for a year now and I love it. the order is ready to mail out just an hour after delivered to them and just one after placing the order to ship it out I get the tracking number. How Amazing service and super quick and reliable. I tried another company in Oregon to save the tax fees I pay to ship to Florida but I end up pay double for shipping and a month to get my order ship out to my final destination. I'd stay with MyUs forever and wish they can have a location in Oregon to save taxes.
